job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
     * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
     * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
     * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
     * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP
job_details.full_text:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping

As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
     * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
     * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
     * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
     * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes a broad range of software development disciplines including back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, and data science. While it mentions 'GenAI technologies' and 'machine learning', it does not go into sufficient detail about specific generative AI tasks, model fine-tuning, RAG systems, or LLM frameworks to classify it as a 'GenAI Engineer'. Similarly, it lacks the specific focus on predictive modeling and MLOps required for an 'ML Engineer'. The role appears to be a generalist software development role that *uses* AI technologies rather than specializing in their development or deployment, fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software' and mentions 'back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture' indicates a broad software engineering scope.
job_tasks.phrase: practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them', indicating a need to understand business problems.
The mention of 'machine learning, data science' suggests involvement in modeling tasks, although not specified as generative or predictive.
The phrase 'rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them' points to software development for creating solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments', which involves building and deploying software.
job_tasks.phrase: showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'DevOps' as one of the disciplines practiced indicates involvement in operations engineering.
The mention of 'GenAI technologies' suggests some level of involvement with generative AI models, though the specifics are not detailed.
The phrase 'Dive Deep to figure out the best approach' in the context of customer challenges and technologies implies research and development, which can include modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: Dive Deep to figure out the best approach

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems' highlights the software development aspect of creating solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems

We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
